title: Lainey Wilson Slays as 2025 CMA Awards Host – See Her Stunning Red Carpet Transformation
shortdescription: Yellowstone star turned country queen owns the night in Nashville.
author: Gossip Guru

content.content: /images/Lainey Wilson Slays as 2025 CMA Awards Host.webp
Queen of Country Owned the Night

Lainey Wilson made history as the first solo female host of the CMA Awards in over a decade — and she did not disappoint. From her five outfit changes to her killer opening monologue roasting Luke Bryan, she absolutely slayed.
Her red carpet look — a custom bell-bottom jumpsuit with 50,000 crystals — instantly became the most Googled fashion moment of the night.
